name: Safari Page Load Test Suite File

description: PLTSUITE files often reference local files rather than HTTP webpages so that the test can be more consistent and run without external Web dependencies. After a page load test is run in Safari, the browser reports how long the page took to load as well as a breakdown of how long each element in the page took to load.
NOTE: PLT is an acronym for Page Load Test, which is a testing concept used by the WebKit browser engine.
